page.title: 05A Day in my Life
page.content: This morning when I got up I went into the bathroom, washed my hands and face, got dressed and went downstairs. I had cornflakes and toast for my breakfast. It was 7.39am. I sat for half an hour watching TVAM. My sister's goldfish died. Tracy was in tears. My mum fed Leanne. I got to give her a small drop of her bottle. It was time to go to school. I went for Margo. We went for Debbie. Michelle Jack caught up with us. We went into school. When the bell rang,we went straight onto maths. After that we did our Domesday Project. After playtime we continued until 11.40am. After that we did geography work. At dinner time we all went round to the dinner hut. There was potatoes, haggis and turnip, and jam sponge and custard for pudding. I enjoyed my lunch.
